title: Great food!! Worth a visit.
text:
Great food!! Worth a visit. Great service by Thomas and the rest of his team. Would highly recommend. Great value for money!!
Tasty carbonara!

title: Brilliant service & Food!
text: Brilliant service & Food! The Greek tapas was lovely, safe to say we underestimated the portions. All were good tapas portions except the gyros which was a full plate. The food was amazing and the serviced matched that- I would highly recommend!

title: Great authentic Greek lunch!
text: Great authentic Greek lunch! We were struggling to find a nice lunch spot as there is a lot and we found this on trip adviser as highly rated! It did not let us down, huge portions and really good value for money! High recommend.

title: Relaxing atmosphere
text: Times wrong in trip adviser, open till 2am. But 12pm for us due to Covid. Found this on trip adviser and we weren’t disappointed. Relaxing atmosphere & very unique cocktails! Good prices, will be returning/recommending.

title: This restaurant has it all!!
text:
This restaurant has it all!!
Great service from friendly and welcoming staff and the food is second to none.
More than expected would highly recommend!!

title: Great views
text:
We took the cable cart up to the top!

There were some great views and you are able to have a look inside the old chapel.

Once you’ve had a look around there isn’t anything else up there apart from a bar. If the sun is out it would be great to chill and have some drinks but It was too windy.

I will review the restaurant on their trip adviser I personally wouldn’t recommend.

title: Best meal yet! The staff were
text:
Best meal yet!
The staff were really welcoming. The chief/owner even came over to ask how our food was.

The bill was very reasonable, three course meal for two with two spirts €50

Would highly recommend the lasagna!!

title: Must do
text:
Must do!
Luckily it wasn’t too busy because of the time of year.
The views from the top were brilliant!

The only downside was that there wasn’t a lot of information around the site explaining what took place where. There were a few brief boards but I would of like to have learnt some more of the history.
But highly recommend, it’s a must do when visiting Athens!

title: Not what I expected
text:
The museum was €5 entry which I thought was reasonable!
I was hoping we were going to learn more history about the gods and what happened in the Acropolis.

The museum was mainly pieces from the Acropolis which had fallen.

The ruins were interesting, see where the villages once were.

title: Lovely lunch spot! Nice views
text:
Lovely lunch spot! Nice views of the church.

We originally had planned to go to one across from the square however it was very empty so we came across to look at the menu.

The food was lovely! We thought it was reasonably priced.

Would recommend to anyone to wants to pop in for some lunch.

title: Lovely stay!
text:
This hotel is fantastic !!

The hotel has a great rooftop space (pool, bar & restaurant) with amazing city views of Athens.

As my partner is a titanium elite member with Marriott. we were upgrade to an amazing suite on the 7th floor and have complimentary access to the M Club where food and drink is complimentary.

Breakfast- has a nice selection, cold deli, cereals, omelette bar or a hot selection!

There is a free shuttle bus every hour into Athens and you can also get a lift back.

Would highly recommend this hotel- we really enjoyed our stay!

title: Great views of the Acropolis
text:
Great views of the Acropolis all lit up.
The food was lovely, and we thought it was reasonably priced.
Both waiters were very nice and able to provide some good recommendations!

title: Great food
text:
The food was really really tasty and the service was top quality.
My only complaint is how small the portions are, I had risotto for main and it was about two large spoonfuls
We will be coming back!!

title: VERY IMPRESSED WITH ALLERGIES
text:
The service was great and it was a lovely vibe Inside!
The food was really nice and I was super impressed how good they were with allergies.

My partner has never tried Thai food because he’s allergic to peanuts and nuts- they were able to take the peanuts out of their dishes and he was able to try different things and he really enjoyed it

title: Nice bar
text:
Not the biggest bar but luckily we were able to get a seat outside- we went in the afternoon mid week.
They made drinks which weren’t on the menu which is always a plus
You can see the monkey cages but you can’t see the actual monkeys from the zoo

title: Lovely meal
text:
We didn’t book a table but we lucky seated straight away.

This was very popular and busy the whole time we were there.

The food was brilliant, we had a great meal and we highly recommend to anyone.

title: Lovely steak!
text:
We came here on our last night- the steak was gorgeous!
The only downside was the menu was limited on the day we came but that we still had a great meal and I don’t feel it impacted us

This place is not cheap however I think it was lovely place to end our trip in Berlin

title: Nice day out
text:
I thought there was a wide selection of animal which I haven’t seen before in other zoo’s!
It was a reasonable price to get into the zoo, the only down fall was that some of the enclosures aren’t very big and it could be a little cleaner

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful Dom, pay €7 and go right up to the very top and see the beautiful sites of Berlin- also stop half way and see the ceremony which takes place inside

title: Great place to visit
text: This is a great memorial- I would recommend going down to the museum, the only down fall is that you have to read throughout and with many people around this becomes incredibly hard!
place: The Holocaust Memorial - Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe

title: Beautiful
text: The gate is beautiful-however it is very busy and a lot of protests hang around this area- I would keep an eye out

title: Lovely hotel
text:
When we arrived we were put into a room with two single beds, they quickly sorted the issue and put us into a double- really happy with the service!
The hotel is very pretty and the location is lovely!
The only issue was we were unable to make the most of the facilities in the hotels as they were closed off for events.

We would return :)

title: Awful waiter AMAZING FOOD
text:
For an overall experience I would only give 2/3 stars but i am giving 4 only based on the food- as the food was really really nice!
We had currywurst and it was lovely!!

But the staff on the other hand was awful! Our male waiter was so rude, which really disappointing!

title: Great show
text:
We watched M Mia, we really enjoyed the show, everyone was great.
Unfortunately the seats let it down for me, the seating was very uncomfortable and there was no space around you.
There was about 6 female toilets on our floor and people were waiting for a while.
We had two vodka and cokes and it came to £20.

But just based on the show itself, it was great and I recommend it to anyone!

title: Enjoyed our food
text:
It’s a quiet atmosphere & there isn’t a lot going on.
However we stopped for a burger and the food was nice, I had the Cod Father and I really enjoyed it.

title: Great location
text:
The location was perfect, right next multiple travel routes.
I found the service lacked a little throughout the stay.
Our room was nice and quiet.
The breakfast I highly recommend, the buffet was lovely and very well cooked.

The spa is nice, it is not very big so you need to be clever with your visiting hours but it very nice.

title: Great Tapas
text:
Great tapas, we had a little issue with nut allergy’s as the menu had Nut sign next to a lot of stuff which had nutmeg in, which is not a nut. But the staff were very helpful and polite & the food is great, was not one dish I didn’t enjoy!
Good price considering you’re in Mayfair-
would 100% return again!

title: My favourite
text:
This zoo is the best I’ve been too.
It’s clean, the animals have loads of space.
And the staff are really friendly.

Go on the little boat trip
We ate in the nice sit down restaurant which was lovely.

title: Afternoon T
text:
We came here for afternoon T, service wise we did feel a little left. There didn’t seem to be anyone around.
The afternoon T was nice and the view is gorgeous.

title: Always a good shout
text:
Love the hard rock, we always get great service and great food.
It isn’t cheap but we always have a great time!

title: Lincj
text:
Stopped here for lunch Sunday afternoon. The restaurant is nice, really enjoyed the food.

The only disappointing part was the add on’s to the bill we weren’t aware of. The lady asked if we wanted a tomato base, to which we said yes. There was an tomato sauce charge put onto our bill including service charge.

But I would recommend you give it a try!
place: Gino D'Acampo My Pizza and Prosecco Bar

title: Hidden Gem
text:
The staff were great, really nice!
When we ordered we requested some changes and they were really accommodating.
We ordered and the food came really quickly, which was great!
I would HIGHLY recommend going!!

title: Lovely stay!
text:
This hotel is extremely beautiful and the 6th floor is a great location.
We had a few hiccups- such as our TV not working but I couldn’t mark them down because the issue was resolved very quickly and complimentary drinks were provided.

The 6th floor can get very busy on the weekends, anyone is welcome to come up- the service drops because of the fact you can’t determine who’s from the hotel and who isn’t! But it’s understandable why people want to come and visit- perfect views and the drinks were lovely!

The breakfast was great, we picked from the small menu and had egg Benedict & avocado with a poached egg, was lovely!

Our only complaint was our towel & water weren’t changed when our room were cleaned but we can’t complain, we had a lovely stay!

The location is great!!

Highly recommended!

title: Brilliant
text:
We had Vincent and Zoe and they were brilliant! They knew a lot of history & Vincent had a great sense of humour too!
I highly recommend this, cocktails were fab and they altered them to fit my taste.

title: Nice!
text:
Love the concept!
Food was good, the onion rings are to die for!!! Deffo recommend.
I wish we got the curly fries they looked really nice, we tried a bacon mayo and cheddar ones instead and I think we made the wrong choice but still nice!!

title: Good
text:
There was a great selection of Art to see!
Tip- take some head phones, it’s free to download the app & it talks you through some of the art- if you forget them and want this feature it’s €5 per person.
The Q’s were pretty big, I would recommend pre paying online & don’t bring a big bag and jackets because the Q to pick them up again was extremely long!!

title: Lovely food!
text:
The food was really nice, I had ribs with a portion of fries and I was so fully I couldn’t finish!
I didn’t think the price was bad at all considering it’s a steak restaurant.
The customer service was good!

title: Lovely
text:
We had a great meal,
The price was pretty reasonable considering we had 7 dishes and four drinks!
We will be back.

title: Lobely
text:
We didn’t sit in- we got a take out- easy process and food was ready when we arrived!
The pizza was lovely.
The base was lovely and it tasted nice and fresh!
Highly recommend and great value for money! (Really cheap)

title: Great little Bar- good for the football
text:
Came here to watch the football and have a drink.
Lovely little bar, nice servers and nice atmosphere.
Unfortunately only one TV downstairs was working but we were able to get a seat and move closer as tables cleared.
We had some nibbles and the food was lovely!
Lovely little bar and will deffo come back!!

My partner works in Cambridge and comes here weekly- highly recommends it!

title: Massive
text:
It’s so big- it quite hard to enjoy because you don’t know where to go next.

We were there for three hours and went into 2 shops before having to leave for a dinner reservation.

It’s an amazing place- but you need to if possible research the places you want to go- as you’d be there all day walking around.

title: Nice break
text:
The start to our trip did not go as planned- one of our rooms had been cancelled and the other room wasn’t what we ordered/paid for. - arriving 6:30 (DUB TIME) (being on 3 hours sleep) our arrival wasn’t very friendly.
However the manager was quick to try and turn our experience around- which we really appreciated.
The breakfast service in the lounge was brilliant, they would bring you anything (omelettes, egg royal ect..)
Every staff member other than the lady who checked us in was super friendly and went above and beyond.
We are big Jumeirah fans and I would return to the beach next time only because it’s walking distance to near by food places- at Saray we had to get taxis everywhere.

But other than our starting experience I don’t have anything bad to say! It’s a lovely place & I recommend you give it a go.

title: Great experience
text:
Food was so good & it’s a great experience. Gutted he wasn’t there.
After 7pm the Q is out the door so maybe get there just before 7- our table was 6:30 and the atmosphere didn’t pick up till about 7

title: Lovely
text:
Can’t fault the food, it was very good.

Our waiter was lovely however he left half way through our main and we were advised someone would talk his spot but we were just left.

Hopefully when the area is a little more built up there will be more of an atmosphere- would come back for the food.

title: Best meal in Dubai
text: Our favourite meal in Dubai, we let the server order a mixture, the food was brilliant and we can’t fault the staff either

title: Good
text:
I’ve been here many times and I’ve never had a bad meal. The only downfall was we booked a table and had to wait 30 mins to be seated.
Other than that, amazing restaurant and we will be back.

title: Lunch
text: We had a lovely lunch here- the staff were lovely- we had 7 dishes and there was only one I wasn’t fond of. The rest were lovely! Would deffo come back!

title: Nice food
text:
Pretty place & the food/service was good.
The only thing I was disappointed about was the selection, i went for a risotto and when I asked if they could add chicken they said no.
The meal didn’t feel me up and it was just vegetables and rice.

Other than that, everything was great!

title: Pretty place (Lunch)
text:
The venue was really pretty and reasonable priced.
I thought the food was ok, my chicken was a little dry and the service wasn’t the best but I would come back for a nice drink :)

title: Nice food
text:
We found it hard to get a table- because we didn’t pre book
The food was lovely and we will be returning!
Lovely outside section aswell- perfect for when the sun arrives

title: Lovely meal
text:
The staff were very welcoming & friendly.
A few things had ran out which was disappointing but they were able to provide alternatives.
I thought the food was lovely!
Worth a try for sure!

title: Great
text:
Really cool experience.
There is loads of different rooms- wine- spirts ect- the music was really good! It was deffo an experience you need to witness

title: Beautfil
text: This was a very beautiful place, we paid 1500 for us both to go to the very top, the views were amazing!

title: Worth the trip
text:
I thought it was an experience and even though while you’ll Q, people will come and offer you bus tours- if didn’t have the same effect for me.
I would recommend going up on it, for the experience.
I really enjoyed it- and the view from the top once you get off is lovely

title: Go!
text: This area is a must see, it is very beautiful, there is a nice little bar on the roof of the Bastion

title: Nice
text: I thought the roof top view was nice, we thought the drinks were really reasonable, was quite hard to get a seat inside and the view wasn’t very visible once inside

title: BRILLIANT STAY
text:
I can not thank you enough, we had a brilliant stay!
Everyone at reception was so helpful from the start to finish.
The room was beautiful- the location was perfect- the breakfast was good- there was a section where they had free drinks 24-7.
This is up there with one of the best stays I’ve ever had.
We were going to the baths on the last day and they extended our room till 2pm free of charge.
You get a slip in your room where you can request an adapter- more pillows ect, I thought the whole service was great.
I will deffo return if I come back to Budapest!
Thank you!!

title: Great experimce
text:
I recommend arriving early because around 11-12 in the afternoon it becomes very busy- the staff were helpful
We paid for our own changing room for 500 HUF more- worth it

BRING YOUR OWN TOWEL AND FLIP FLOPS OR SLIPPERS

title: Disappointed
text:
The staff were professional and took us to to our table, the place itself it’s very beautiful and I would recommend even going for a coffee for the experience.
I was disappointed with the food- we had sausage for starter and this was lovely however for main I ordered the penne pasta and it was a bowl of pasta in tomato sauce- no meat? Seasoning? We had two drinks each and the bill was 30,000 HUF- which is £82!!! We were totally shocked when the bill arrived! There was a service charge of 15% on the meal and the drinks.
I personally wouldn’t recommend for food- but I would for a drink!
I think it’s way to pricey and The food wasn’t to my taste

title: Pretty
text: Very pretty- if you want to see it at night lit up, I recommend booking into the night time cruise boat

title: GO- One of the best meals I’ve ever had
text:
We visited here on our last night.
The service was brilliant, the staff were really friendly and helpful.
It had a nice atmosphere with live musicians and the food was unbelievable, one of the best meals I’ve ever had ( I had chicken pancakes to start & the mascarpone pasta for main)
I highly recommend- if we ever return to Budapest we will be back!
We were so shocked how cheap the bill was- think it was just under mid 20’s (20,000) which was great value considering the level or service and food itself, we had a three course meal and 4 drinks!

title: Fab
text:
Lots of screens, only issue we faced was that you couldn’t stand at the bar if there wasn’t a table you weren’t allowed to stay, however we jumped on a table with someone else and don’t have any complaints!
We had some bar snacks which were nice and the drinks were a good price

title: Nice
text:
The food was nice,
The concept it quite sweet- you can cook the meat yourself on the stoves
The service was fine, the waitress was helpful
I personally wouldn’t come back as I feel it’s a one time experience

title: Interesting
text:
It was an interesting museum and pretty cheap for access.
I did find it a little confusing, you can purchase some head phones which help explain each room but it was double the price.
Each room has a English print out which explains what each room is showing but some of them were 2 A4 pages, which was an effort to read.
I would recommend going if you’re looking for something to do, it wasn’t expensive so we don’t feel any type of way for going

title: Brilliant service
text:
After initially thinking we weren’t going to be allowed in, we were seated upstairs- greeted by great waiters, they talked through the menu and helped us pick the correct cocktails.
Beautiful view outside, I would highly recommend going up for some cocktails

title: Great!
text:
We came in for a late Sunday lunch- we hadn’t booked a table, we were told to sit at the bar and get a drink & he would try and get us a table! Within 5 minutes he got us a table!
The service was brilliant- I think he was called Jamie?
The food was amazing- isn’t my first time and the food is always very good!!
I deffo will be returning! Highly recommend this place

title: AWFUL SERVICE
text:
the Q was so big we were queuing outside, which is fine. However when we finally got inside to q, there was a table for 14 with empty plates & a empty table of four and the plates had not been cleared.

We waited for another 15 minutes and no one cleared these tables? The girls were just standing at the counter chatting.
Finally we got seated waited another length of time just for menu.

The menu had a make your own section which I thought was good idea! The food was good!

Unfortunately I won’t be returning. & I wouldn’t recommend if your not a student because it’s student central!

title: Good Food
text:
Great service, really friendly & helpful!- served by Conor.
Food was nice and a nice atmosphere.
We will deffo come back!

title: Always great
text:
Always very busy but the service and food is always good!
Reasonable prices, the drinks are the pricey part!!

Deffo recommend

title: Good food, awful service
text:
You can’t pre book.. so we had to wait for 45 mins for a table!

The service was shocking but the food was fast and it was nice. We had drinks, mains and 2 sides and it was £15 a head! Which is great.

If you want good and cheap food, give it a go but the service is really awful so don’t expect much in that sense.

title: Great
text:
We really enjoyed the food, the service was very good. My partner had a nut allergy and they were very attentive.

Will be Coming back

title: Brilliant idea
text:
We went to easy wine and had a awful experience so we were not keen on giving this a go but my partner loves beer.

The beer was reasonably priced, and the idea is good!

Food was lovely!! Deffo go

The food was lovely!!

Recommend this to anyone!

title: Nice hotel
text:
Nice rooms, good service and great location!
Opposite spinningfields, no need for taxis as a lot of great food places in spinningfields and Deansgate!

10 minute walk to town!

My go to stay when I come down to visit my daughter!

title: Lived up to expectations
text:
The receptionist was very welcoming!

Rooms were lovely, breakfast was good, there was a chef in the corner who makes omelettes and eggs Benedict, which was a good touch!

The pool facilities were lovely and the gym was very good, had a wide range of machines and weights!

Tomorrow is our last full day and we leave Sunday and we would 100% return and recommend this to anyone! The location is perfect, 5 minute walk to the old town!

Quite location and the beds were lovely, we had a great night sleep!

title: What a surprise!!
text:
We had originally planned to go to a steak house. The restaurant was fully booked so we came here!
Great service and great atmosphere!!

We ordered the steak and we were pleasantly surprised, it was gorgeous!! The restaurant was packed so we were very surprised with the speed, service and standard of food!!

Would recommend this to anyone!! Wish we could come back but we leave tomorrow!

title: Personally wouldn’t return
text:
Came here for lunch, I don’t actually drink wine but if you did I would recommend coming for sure!
We had a 4 tapas starters and I have to say it was one of the worst I’ve ever had...
The main arrived I had risotto and my partner also had pasta but asked without mushrooms however it arrived with mushrooms and I had finished mine before his dish returned but we both said how lovely the main dish was!
The staff were ok..

It’s a tough one, I personally wouldn’t go again but if you do enjoy wine then for that part of the experience I would recommend giving it a go?

title: Couldn’t recommend enoygh
text:
It’s a small little place
We had two course meal and drinks and was €15 a person, so very cheap!
The risotto was INSANE, my partner had the salmon and I had the chicken and we have both said we will be returning if we have time!!
Deffo recommend

title: Lovely
text:
Nice atmosphere, attractive decor, waitress spoke perfect English and was very attentive!
We both had the farmer burger and it was lovely, really tasty and the dip was lush!

title: Great service
text:
Came here for breakfast, it was quite small so there was a little wait but the lady sat us at the bar and served us some drinks!

I wanted a fry up but being the picky girl I am, I don’t like mushrooms, tomatoes, fried eggs or black pudding, she was so lovely that she basically made me my own special fry up including all the things I liked.

Can’t fault the service and we will deffo be returning!!!

title: Must go!
text:
All I need to say is go!
The service is good and the food is amazing!! I didn’t know what to expect but it’s brilliant, something very different!!

I wouldn’t walk in, always book a table!
